Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the device type.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the device type.

EnumEntry.Name: Transceiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.

EnumEntry.Name: Peripheral
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controllable device (with no data stream handling).
EnumEntry.Description: Controllable device (with no data stream handling).

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

String.Name: DeviceVendorName
String.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
String.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

String.Name: DeviceFamilyName
String.ToolTip: Identifier of the product family of the device.
String.Description: Identifier of the product family of the device.

String.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
String.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
String.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

String.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
String.Description: Device's serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestEntrySelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the manifest entry to reference.
Integer.Description: Selects the manifest entry to reference.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMajorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLSubMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the subminor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the subminor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.DisplayName: Device Manifest XML Sub Minor Version

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMajorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minor version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.

String.Name: DeviceManifestPrimaryURL
String.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.
String.Description: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.

String.Name: DeviceManifestSecondaryURL
String.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.
String.Description: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transport Layer type of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Transport Layer type of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceGenCPVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Major version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceGenCPVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device. This can be used to estimate if the physical connection(s) can sustain transfer of free-running images from the camera at its maximum speed.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which Connection of the device to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which Connection of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission of the specified Connection.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission of the specified Connection

Enumeration.Name: DeviceConnectionStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which Link of the device to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which Link of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkConnectionCount
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the number of physical connection of the device used by a particular Link.
Integer.Description: Returns the number of physical connection of the device used by a particular Link.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the Link's heartbeat.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the Link's heartbeat.

Float.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.
Float.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.

Float.Name: DeviceLinkCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link. This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent on that link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the type of the stream channel.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the type of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelLink
Integer.ToolTip: Index of device's Link to use for streaming the specified stream channel.
Integer.Description: Index of device's Link to use for streaming the specified stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelEndianness
Enumeration.ToolTip: Endianness of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Enumeration.Description: Endianness of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

EnumEntry.Name: Big
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stream channel data is big Endian.
EnumEntry.Description: Stream channel data is big Endian.

EnumEntry.Name: Little
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stream channel data is little Endian.
EnumEntry.Description: Stream channel data is little Endian.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a Transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a Transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a receiver.

Integer.Name: DeviceEventChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by the strings of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by the strings of the device.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceIndicatorMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.

EnumEntry.Name: Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device's indicators are active showing their respective status.
EnumEntry.Description: Device's indicators are active showing their respective status.

EnumEntry.Name: ErrorStatus
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device's indicators are inactive unless an error occurs.
EnumEntry.Description: Device's indicators are inactive unless an error occurs.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceStart
Command.ToolTip: Indicate to the device and GenICam XML to get ready for persisting of all streamable features.
Command.Description: Indicate to the device and GenICam XML to get ready for persisting of all streamable features.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceEnd
Command.ToolTip: Indicate to the device the end of feature persistence.
Command.Description: Indicate to the device the end of feature persistence.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingStart
Command.ToolTip: Prepare the device for registers streaming without checking for consistency.
Command.Description: Prepare the device for registers streaming without checking for consistency.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingEnd
Command.ToolTip: Announce the end of registers streaming.
Command.Description: Announce the end of registers streaming. This will do a register set validation for consistency and activate it. This will also update the DeviceRegistersValid flag.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersCheck
Command.ToolTip: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency.
Command.Description: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency. This will update the DeviceRegistersValid flag.

Boolean.Name: DeviceRegistersValid
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceRegistersEndianness
Enumeration.ToolTip: Endianness of the registers of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Endianness of the registers of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceClockSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the clock frequency to access from the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Clock frequency of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Clock frequency of the image sensor of the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorDigitization
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Clock frequency of the camera A/D conversion stage.
EnumEntry.Description: Clock frequency of the camera A/D conversion stage.

EnumEntry.Name: CameraLink
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.
EnumEntry.Description: Frequency of the Camera Link clock.

Float.Name: DeviceClockFrequency
Float.ToolTip: Returns the frequency of the selected Clock.
Float.Description: Returns the frequency of the selected Clock.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which serial port of the device to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which serial port of the device to control.

EnumEntry.Name: CameraLink
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Serial port associated to the Camera link connection.
EnumEntry.Description: Serial port associated to the Camera link connection.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortBaudRate
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the baud rate used by the selected serial port.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the baud rate used by the selected serial port.

Integer.Name: Timestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Command.Name: TimestampReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Command.Description: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Command.Name: TimestampLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue.

Integer.Name: TimestampLatchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter.

String.Name: UserSetDescription
String.ToolTip: Description of the selected User Set content.
String.Description: Description of the selected User Set content.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Float.Name: SensorPixelWidth
Float.ToolTip: Physical size (pitch) in the x direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the x direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.

Float.Name: SensorPixelHeight
Float.ToolTip: Physical size (pitch) in the y direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the y direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.

String.Name: SensorName
String.ToolTip: Product name of the imaging Sensor.
String.Description: Product name of the imaging Sensor.

Enumeration.Name: SensorShutterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the shutter mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the shutter mode of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Global
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time at the same time.

EnumEntry.Name: Rolling
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens and closes sequentially for groups (typically lines) of pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens and closes sequentially for groups (typically lines) of pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time but not at the same time.

EnumEntry.Name: GlobalReset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens at the same time for all pixels but ends in a sequential manner.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens at the same time for all pixels but ends in a sequential manner. The pixels are exposed for different lengths of time.

Enumeration.Name: SensorTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of taps of the camera sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Number of taps of the camera sensor.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Enumeration.Description: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction0 output Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction0 output Region.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction1 output Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction1 output Region.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction2 output Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction2 output Region.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.

Enumeration.Name: RegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the usage of the Region.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the usage of the Region.

Enumeration.Name: RegionDestination
Enumeration.ToolTip: Control the destination of the selected region.
Enumeration.Description: Control the destination of the selected region.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 1.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 2.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 2.

Integer.Name: RegionIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to the selected Region.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to the selected Region.

Enumeration.Name: ComponentSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Intensity
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of intensity (monochrome or color) of the visible reflected light is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of intensity (monochrome or color) of the visible reflected light is controlled.

EnumEntry.Name: Infrared
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of non-visible infrared light is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of non-visible infrared light is controlled.

EnumEntry.Name: Ultraviolet
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of non-visible ultraviolet light is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of non-visible ultraviolet light is controlled.

EnumEntry.Name: Range
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of range (distance) data is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of range (distance) data is controlled. The data produced may be only range (2.5D) or a point cloud giving the 3D coordinates depending on the Scan3dControl features.

EnumEntry.Name: Reflectance
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The reflected intensity acquired together with Range in a Linescan3D sensor acquiring a single linescan profile for each exposure of the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: The reflected intensity acquired together with Range in a Linescan3D sensor acquiring a single linescan profile for each exposure of the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Confidence
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of confidence map of the acquired image is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of confidence map of the acquired image is controlled. Confidence data may be binary (0 - invalid) or an integer where 0 is invalid and increasing value is increased confidence in the data in the corresponding pixel. If floating point representation is used the confidence image is normalized to the range [0,1], for integer representation the maximum possible integer represents maximum confidence.

EnumEntry.Name: Disparity
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of stereo camera disparity data is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of stereo camera disparity data is controlled. Disparity is a more specific range format approximately inversely proportional to distance. Disparity is typically given in pixel units.

EnumEntry.Name: Scatter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of data measuring how much light is scattered around the reflected light.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of data measuring how much light is scattered around the reflected light. In processing this is used as an additional intensity image, often together with the standard intensity or reflectance.

EnumEntry.Name: Multispectral
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of multiple spectral bands corresponding to various light wavelenghts is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of multiple spectral bands corresponding to various light wavelenghts is controlled.

Boolean.Name: ComponentEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.

Integer.Name: ComponentIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by ComponentSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by ComponentSelector.

Enumeration.Name: GroupSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a Group of component to control or inquire.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a Group of component to control or inquire. The GroupSelector determines which components Group will be used for the selected features.

Integer.Name: GroupIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value corresponding to the selected Group of Components.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value corresponding to the selected Group of Components. If no grouping is required, this value should be set to 0.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Boolean.Name: LinePitchEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature controls whether the LinePitch feature is writable.
Boolean.Description: This feature controls whether the LinePitch feature is writable. Otherwise LinePitch is implicitly controlled by the combination of features like Width, PixelFormat, etc...

Integer.Name: LinePitch
Integer.ToolTip: Total number of bytes between the starts of 2 consecutive lines.
Integer.Description: Total number of bytes between the starts of 2 consecutive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data.

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1 binning.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2 binning.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine vertical photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine vertical photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Discard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The values of a group of N adjacent pixels are averaged.
EnumEntry.Description: The values of a group of N adjacent pixels are averaged.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Discard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The values of a group of N adjacent pixels are averaged.
EnumEntry.Description: The values of a group of N adjacent pixels are averaged.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormatInfoSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the pixel format for which the information will be returned.
Enumeration.Description: Select the pixel format for which the information will be returned.

Integer.Name: PixelFormatInfoID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the value used by the streaming channels to identify the selected pixel format.
Integer.Description: Returns the value used by the streaming channels to identify the selected pixel format.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the darkest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the smallest value that each color component can take.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the brightest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the biggest value that each color component can take.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the sensor's test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor's test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Black
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: White
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves vertically from top to bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves vertically from top to bottom at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: VerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: ColorBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.

Enumeration.Name: Deinterlacing
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.
Enumeration.Description: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDuplication
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.

EnumEntry.Name: Weave
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
Enumeration.Description: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer. Optionally, chunk data can be appended to the compressed image (See the REF _Ref397502619 \h chapter).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.Description: Default value. Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionRateOption
Enumeration.ToolTip: Two rate controlling options are offered: fixed bit rate or fixed quality.
Enumeration.Description: Two rate controlling options are offered: fixed bit rate or fixed quality. The exact implementation to achieve one or the other is vendor-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: FixBitrate
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output stream follows a constant bit rate.
EnumEntry.Description: Output stream follows a constant bit rate. Allows easy bandwidth management on the link.

EnumEntry.Name: FixQuality
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output stream has a constant image quality.
EnumEntry.Description: Output stream has a constant image quality. Can be used when image processing algorithms are sensitive to image degradation caused by excessive data compression.

Integer.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
Integer.ToolTip: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.
Integer.Description: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.

Float.Name: ImageCompressionBitrate
Float.ToolTip: Control the rate of the produced compressed stream.
Float.Description: Control the rate of the produced compressed stream.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionJPEGFormatOption
Enumeration.ToolTip: When JPEG is selected as the compression format, a device might optionally offer better control over JPEG-specific options through this feature.
Enumeration.Description: When JPEG is selected as the compression format, a device might optionally offer better control over JPEG-specific options through this feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Lossless
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects lossless JPEG compression based on a predictive coding model.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects lossless JPEG compression based on a predictive coding model.

EnumEntry.Name: BaselineStandard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates this is a baseline sequential (single-scan) DCT-based JPEG.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates this is a baseline sequential (single-scan) DCT-based JPEG.

EnumEntry.Name: BaselineOptimized
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Provides optimized color and slightly better compression than baseline standard by using custom Huffman tables optimized after statistical analysis of the image content.
EnumEntry.Description: Provides optimized color and slightly better compression than baseline standard by using custom Huffman tables optimized after statistical analysis of the image content.

EnumEntry.Name: Progressive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates this is a progressive (multi-scan) DCT-based JPEG.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates this is a progressive (multi-scan) DCT-based JPEG.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStopMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls how the AcquisitionStop command and the acquisition stopped using a trigger (e.g.
Enumeration.Description: Controls how the AcquisitionStop command and the acquisition stopped using a trigger (e.g. AcquisitionActive, FrameBurstActive, FrameActive or FrameEnd trigger), ends an ongoing frame. This feature is mainly used in Linescan devices where each line in a frame is acquired sequentially.

EnumEntry.Name: Complete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: When stopped during a frame, the device will continue acquisition of lines until the specified Height is reached to deliver a complete default size frame.
EnumEntry.Description: When stopped during a frame, the device will continue acquisition of lines until the specified Height is reached to deliver a complete default size frame. Note that if each line is triggered from an external source and this line trigger stops no frame is delivered, and an AcquisitionAbort is needed.

EnumEntry.Name: Immediate
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame and only the lines acquired at the time are delivered.
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame and only the lines acquired at the time are delivered.

EnumEntry.Name: ImmediateWithPadding
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame but the remaining of the frame will be padded with data to deliver a complete default Height frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame but the remaining of the frame will be padded with data to deliver a complete default Height frame.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.ToolTip: Aborts the Acquisition immediately.
Command.Description: Aborts the Acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger. If no Acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored.

Command.Name: AcquisitionArm
Command.ToolTip: Arms the device before an AcquisitionStart command.
Command.Description: Arms the device before an AcquisitionStart command. This optional command validates all the current features for consistency and prepares the device for a fast start of the Acquisition.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime, etc...

Float.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Lines in a Frame are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Lines in a Frame are captured.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionLineRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionLineRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionLineRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime, etc...

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTransfer
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently transferring an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently transferring an acquisition of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames. The Acquisition is activated when the trigger signal becomes active and terminated when it goes back to the inactive state.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in linescan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in linescan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in linescan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in linescan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: LineStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in linescan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in linescan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: MultiSlopeExposureLimit1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the first duration of a multi-slope exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the first duration of a multi-slope exposure. Exposure is continued according to the pre-defined multi-slope settings.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: SoftwareSignal0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.

EnumEntry.Name: SoftwareSignal1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.

EnumEntry.Name: SoftwareSignal2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be a signal generated by software using the SoftwareSignalPulse command.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter0Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter1Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter2Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter0End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter1End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter2End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer0Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer1Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer2Start
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer0End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer1End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer2End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Timer signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Encoder0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Encoder1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Encoder2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Encoder signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: LogicBlock0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: LogicBlock1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: LogicBlock2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Logic Block signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Action0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Action1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Action2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: LinkTrigger0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).

EnumEntry.Name: LinkTrigger1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).

EnumEntry.Name: LinkTrigger2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Link Trigger to use as source for the trigger (received from the transport layer).

EnumEntry.Name: CC1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use. This ensures a direct mapping between the lines on the frame grabber and on the camera. Applicable to CameraLink products only.

EnumEntry.Name: CC2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use. This ensures a direct mapping between the lines on the frame grabber and on the camera. Applicable to CameraLink products only.

EnumEntry.Name: CC3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use. This ensures a direct mapping between the lines on the frame grabber and on the camera. Applicable to CameraLink products only.

EnumEntry.Name: CC4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the Camera Link physical line and associated I/O control block to use. This ensures a direct mapping between the lines on the frame grabber and on the camera. Applicable to CameraLink products only.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame or line.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame or line. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted (or latched) for a new frame or a new line.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

EnumEntry.Name: PreviousFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous frame.

EnumEntry.Name: PreviousLine
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous line.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous line.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Integer.Name: TriggerDivider
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies a division factor for the incoming trigger pulses.
Integer.Description: Specifies a division factor for the incoming trigger pulses.

Integer.Name: TriggerMultiplier
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies a multiplication factor for the incoming trigger pulses.
Integer.Description: Specifies a multiplication factor for the incoming trigger pulses. It is generally used in conjunction with TriggerDivider to control the ratio of triggers that are accepted.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerControlled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current Frame or Line triggers.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current Frame or Line triggers. See ExposureStart, ExposureEnd and ExposureActive of the TriggerSelector feature.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureTimeMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the configuration mode of the ExposureTime feature.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the configuration mode of the ExposureTime feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Common
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure time is common to all the color components.
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure time is common to all the color components. The common ExposureTime value to use can be set selecting it with ExposureTimeSelector[Common].

EnumEntry.Name: Individual
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure time is individual for each color component.
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure time is individual for each color component. Each individual ExposureTime values to use can be set by selecting them with ExposureTimeSelector.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureTimeSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which exposure time is controlled by the ExposureTime feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which exposure time is controlled by the ExposureTime feature. This allows for independent control over the exposure components.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Enumeration.Name: MultiSlopeMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls multi-slope exposure state.
Enumeration.Description: Controls multi-slope exposure state.

Integer.Name: MultiSlopeKneePointCount
Integer.ToolTip: The number of knee-points as well as the number of additional exposure slopes used for multi-slope exposure.
Integer.Description: The number of knee-points as well as the number of additional exposure slopes used for multi-slope exposure.

Integer.Name: MultiSlopeKneePointSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the parameters for controlling an additional slope in multi-slope exposure.
Integer.Description: Selects the parameters for controlling an additional slope in multi-slope exposure.

Float.Name: MultiSlopeExposureLimit
Float.ToolTip: Percent of the ExposureTime at a certain knee-point of multi-slope exposure.
Float.Description: Percent of the ExposureTime at a certain knee-point of multi-slope exposure.

Float.Name: MultiSlopeSaturationThreshold
Float.ToolTip: The percentage of the full saturation that is applied at a certain knee-point of a multi-slope exposure.
Float.Description: The percentage of the full saturation that is applied at a certain knee-point of a multi-slope exposure.

Float.Name: MultiSlopeIntensityLimit
Float.ToolTip: The relative intensity which divides intensities influenced by different exposure slopes.
Float.Description: The relative intensity which divides intensities influenced by different exposure slopes.

Float.Name: MultiSlopeExposureGradient
Float.ToolTip: The gradient of the additional slope that is defined by this knee-point.
Float.Description: The gradient of the additional slope that is defined by this knee-point.

Boolean.Name: CxpFirstLineTriggerWithFrameStart
Boolean.ToolTip: Specifies if a FrameStart trigger also triggers the first LineStart at the same time.
Boolean.Description: Specifies if a FrameStart trigger also triggers the first LineStart at the same time.
Boolean.DisplayName: Cxp First Line Trigger With Frame Start

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the blue channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Y
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to Y channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to Y channel.

EnumEntry.Name: U
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to U channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to U channel.

EnumEntry.Name: V
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to V channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to V channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to Tap 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to Tap 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to Tap 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to Tap 2.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogRed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red analog channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red analog channel.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogGreen
