Integer.Description: Returns identifier of the stream channel used to carry the block.

Integer.Name: ChunkSequencerSetActive
Integer.ToolTip: Return the index of the active set of the running sequencer included in the payload.
Integer.Description: Return the index of the active set of the running sequencer included in the payload.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dDistanceUnit
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the Distance Unit of the payload image.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the Distance Unit of the payload image.

EnumEntry.Name: Millimeter
EnumEntry.Description: Default value. Distance values are in millimeter units.

EnumEntry.Name: Inch
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Distance values are in inch units.
EnumEntry.Description: Distance values are in inch units.

EnumEntry.Name: Pixel
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Distance values are given as a multiple of the size of a pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: Distance values are given as a multiple of the size of a pixel.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dOutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the Calibrated Mode of the payload image.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the Calibrated Mode of the payload image.

EnumEntry.Name: UncalibratedC
EnumEntry.Description: Uncalibrated 2.5D Depth map. The distance data does not represent a physical unit and may be non-linear. The data is a 2.5D range map only.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedABC_Grid
EnumEntry.Description: 3 Coordinates in grid organization. The full 3 coordinate data with the grid array organization from the sensor kept.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedABC_PointCloud
EnumEntry.Description: 3 Coordinates without organization. The full 3 coordinate data without any organization of data points. Typically only valid points transmitted giving varying image size.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedAC
EnumEntry.Description: 2 Coordinates with fixed B sampling. The data is sent as a A and C coordinates (X,Z or Theta,Rho). The B (Y) axis uses the scale and offset parameters for the B axis.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedAC_Linescan
EnumEntry.Description: 2 Coordinates with varying sampling. The data is sent as a A and C coordinates (X,Z or Theta,Rho). The B (Y) axis comes from the encoder chunk value.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedC
EnumEntry.Description: Calibrated 2.5D Depth map. The distance data is expressed in the chosen distance unit. The data is a 2.5D range map. No information on X-Y axes available.

EnumEntry.Name: CalibratedC_Linescan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Depth Map with varying B sampling.
EnumEntry.Description: Depth Map with varying B sampling. The distance data is expressed in the chosen distance unit. The data is a 2.5D range map. The B (Y) axis comes from the encoder chunk value.

EnumEntry.Name: RectifiedC
EnumEntry.Description: Rectified 2.5D Depth map. The distance data has been rectified to a uniform sampling pattern in the X and Y direction. The data is a 2.5D range map only. If a complete 3D point cloud is rectified but transmitted as explicit coordinates it should be transmitted as one of the "CalibratedABC" formats.

EnumEntry.Name: RectifiedC_Linescan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Rectified 2.5D Depth map with varying B sampling.
EnumEntry.Description: Rectified 2.5D Depth map with varying B sampling. The data is sent as rectified 1D profiles using Coord3D_C pixels. The B (Y) axis comes from the encoder chunk value.

EnumEntry.Name: DisparityC
EnumEntry.Description: Disparity 2.5D Depth map. The distance is inversely proportional to the pixel (disparity) value.

EnumEntry.Name: DisparityC_Linescan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disparity 2.5D Depth map with varying B sampling.
EnumEntry.Description: Disparity 2.5D Depth map with varying B sampling. The distance is inversely proportional to the pixel (disparity) value. The B (Y) axis comes from the encoder chunk value.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateSystem
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the Coordinate System of the image included in the payload.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the Coordinate System of the image included in the payload.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateSystemReference
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the Coordinate System Position of the image included in the payload.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the Coordinate System Position of the image included in the payload.

EnumEntry.Name: Anchor
EnumEntry.Description: Default value. Original fixed reference. The coordinate system fixed relative the camera reference point marker is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Transformed
EnumEntry.Description: Transformed reference system. The transformed coordinate system is used according to the definition in the rotation and translation matrices.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Coordinate to retrieve data from.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Coordinate to retrieve data from.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateScale
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Scale for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.
Float.Description: Returns the Scale for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateOffset
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Offset for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.
Float.Description: Returns the Offset for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.

Boolean.Name: ChunkScan3dInvalidDataFlag
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if a specific non-valid data flag is used in the data stream.
Boolean.Description: Returns if a specific non-valid data flag is used in the data stream.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dInvalidDataValue
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Invalid Data Value used for the image included in the payload.
Float.Description: Returns the Invalid Data Value used for the image included in the payload.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dAxisMin
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Minimum Axis value for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.
Float.Description: Returns the Minimum Axis value for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dAxisMax
Float.ToolTip: Returns the Maximum Axis value for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.
Float.Description: Returns the Maximum Axis value for the selected coordinate axis of the image included in the payload.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateTransformSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for transform values.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for transform values.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dTransformValue
Float.ToolTip: Returns the transform value.
Float.Description: Returns the transform value.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateReferenceSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector to read a coordinate system reference value defining the transform of a point from one system to the other.
Enumeration.Description: Selector to read a coordinate system reference value defining the transform of a point from one system to the other.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dCoordinateReferenceValue
Float.ToolTip: Returns the value of a position or pose coordinate for the anchor or transformed coordinate systems relative to the reference point.
Float.Description: Returns the value of a position or pose coordinate for the anchor or transformed coordinate systems relative to the reference point.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dFocalLength
Float.ToolTip: Returns the focal length of the camera in pixel.
Float.Description: Returns the focal length of the camera in pixel. The focal length depends on the selected region. The value of this feature takes into account horizontal binning, decimation, or any other function changing the image resolution.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dBaseline
Float.ToolTip: Returns the baseline as the physical distance of two cameras in a stereo camera setup.
Float.Description: Returns the baseline as the physical distance of two cameras in a stereo camera setup. The value of this feature can be used for 3D reconstruction from disparity images. In this case, the unit of the 3D coordinates corresponds to the unit of the baseline.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dPrincipalPointU
Float.ToolTip: Returns the value of this feature gives the horizontal position of the principal point, relative to the region origin, i.e.
Float.Description: Returns the value of this feature gives the horizontal position of the principal point, relative to the region origin, i.e. OffsetX. The value of this feature takes into account horizontal binning, decimation, or any other function changing the image resolution.

Float.Name: ChunkScan3dPrincipalPointV
Float.ToolTip: Returns the value of this feature gives the vertical position of the principal point, relative to the region origin, i.e.
Float.Description: Returns the value of this feature gives the vertical position of the principal point, relative to the region origin, i.e. OffsetY. The value of this feature takes into account vertical binning, decimation, or any other function changing the image resolution.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature.
Integer.Description: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature. When this feature is written, the device waits a time period corresponding to the value of TestPendingAck before acknowledging the write.

Command.Name: TestEventGenerate
Command.ToolTip: Generates a Test Event.
Command.Description: Generates a Test Event.

Enumeration.Name: TestPayloadFormatMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows setting a device in test mode and to output a specific payload format for validation of data streaming.
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows setting a device in test mode and to output a specific payload format for validation of data streaming. This feature is intended solely for test purposes. The data can be real acquired data or any test pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.Description: The test mode is disabled. This feature has no effect and the device is streaming data normally according to its configuration. This option has to be the default after each boot of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiPart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device streams data using multi-part payload format with at least one part in each payload.
EnumEntry.Description: The device streams data using multi-part payload format with at least one part in each payload. This option must be present if and only if the device supports the multi-part payload format. If the underlying transport layer negotiation has failed to allow the device to enter multi-part mode, it must not be possible to enable this test mode.

EnumEntry.Name: GenDC
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device streams data using GenDC payload format with at least one component in each payload.
EnumEntry.Description: The device streams data using GenDC payload format with at least one component in each payload. This option must be present if the device supports the GenDC payload format. If the underlying transport layer negotiation has failed to allow the device to enter GenDC mode, it must not be possible to enable this test mode.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: TLParamsLockedSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of feature for which the locking behavior will be configured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of feature for which the locking behavior will be configured.

EnumEntry.Name: ImageSize
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the images size is locked during the acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the images size is locked during the acquisition. ImageSize represents width and height for area-scan cameras; it only represents width for linescan cameras.

EnumEntry.Name: PixelFormat
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the pixel format (PixelFormat) is locked during an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the pixel format (PixelFormat) is locked during an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: PixelSize
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the size of the pixel can change during an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the size of the pixel can change during an acquisition. When locked, the PixelFormat is allowed to change as long as PixelSize is not affected.

EnumEntry.Name: ExtendedPayload
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if a device is allowed to switch between a payload and its extended version during an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if a device is allowed to switch between a payload and its extended version during an acquisition.

Boolean.Name: TLParamsLockedState
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the selected parameters are locked during acquisition.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the selected parameters are locked during acquisition.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each data buffer or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each data buffer or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Enumeration.Name: GenDCStreamingMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device's streaming format.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device's streaming format.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device will only stream data in its native format.
EnumEntry.Description: The device will only stream data in its native format.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device will stream all its data in the generic GenDC format.
EnumEntry.Description: The device will stream all its data in the generic GenDC format.

EnumEntry.Name: Automatic
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device will automatically choose in which format it streams its data.
EnumEntry.Description: The device will automatically choose in which format it streams its data.

Enumeration.Name: GenDCStreamingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns whether the current device data streaming format is GenDC.
Enumeration.Description: Returns whether the current device data streaming format is GenDC. This value is conditioned by the GenDCStreamingMode.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device will only stream data in its native format.
EnumEntry.Description: The device will only stream data in its native format.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device will stream all its data in the generic GenDC format.
EnumEntry.Description: The device will stream all its data in the generic GenDC format.

Register.Name: GenDCDescriptor
Register.ToolTip: Returns a preliminary GenDC Descriptor that can be used as reference for the data to be streamed out by the device in its current configuration.
Register.Description: Returns a preliminary GenDC Descriptor that can be used as reference for the data to be streamed out by the device in its current configuration. This information can be used to set up the receiver in advance to be ready for the data Containers to come.

Register.Name: GenDCFlowMappingTable
Register.ToolTip: Returns the GenDC Container data Flow mapping table that will be used to transport the GenDC Container.
Register.Description: Returns the GenDC Container data Flow mapping table that will be used to transport the GenDC Container.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Boolean.Name: PtpEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP).
Boolean.Description: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP).

Enumeration.Name: PtpClockAccuracy
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.

Command.Name: PtpDataSetLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current values from the device's PTP clock data set.
Command.Description: Latches the current values from the device's PTP clock data set.

Enumeration.Name: PtpStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock.

Enumeration.Name: PtpServoStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the clock servo.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the clock servo. When the servo is in a locked state, the value returned is 'Locked'. When the servo is in a non-locked state, a device-specific value can be returned to give specific information. If no device-specific value is available to describe the current state of the clock servo, the value should be 'Unknown'.

Integer.Name: PtpOffsetFromMaster
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds.

Integer.Name: PtpClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched clock ID of the PTP device.

Integer.Name: PtpParentClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device. The parent clock ID is the clock ID of the current master clock.

Integer.Name: PtpGrandmasterClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device. The grandmaster clock ID is the clock ID of the current grandmaster clock.

Enumeration.Name: GevPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.

Integer.Name: GevActiveLinkCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current number of active logical links.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current number of active logical links.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel0BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stream Channel 0 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.Description: Stream Channel 0 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream Channel 0 Big And Little Endian

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel1BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stream Channel 1 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.Description: Stream Channel 1 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream Channel 1 Big And Little Endian

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel2BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stream Channel 2 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.Description: Stream Channel 2 Big And Little Endian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream Channel 2 Big And Little Endian

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which logical link to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which logical link to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the logical link.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameReception
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameTransmission
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.DisplayName: Gev Current IP Configuration Persistent IP

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address of the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address of the given logical link.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the current IP configuration status.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the current IP configuration status.

String.Name: GevFirstURL
String.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
String.Description: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the GenICam XML device description file.

String.Name: GevSecondURL
String.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
String.Description: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file. This URL is an alternative if the application was unsuccessful to retrieve the device description file using the first URL.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevDiscoveryAckDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodesSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.DisplayName: Gev GVCP Extended Status Codes Selector

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodes
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of extended status codes.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPPendingAck
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVSPExtendedIDMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the extended IDs mode.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the extended IDs mode.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGPacketResendDestination
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the alternate IP destination for stream packets resent due to a packet resend request.
Boolean.Description: Enables the alternate IP destination for stream packets resent due to a packet resend request. When True, the source IP address provided in the packet resend command packet is used. When False, the value set in the GevSCDA[GevStreamChannelSelector] feature is used.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGAllInTransmission
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected GVSP transmitter to use the single packet per data block All-in Transmission mode.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected GVSP transmitter to use the single packet per data block All-in Transmission mode.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGExtendedChunkData
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.
Boolean.Description: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of the logical link to use.
Integer.Description: Index of the logical link to use.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: This GigE Vision specific feature corresponds to DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize and should be kept in sync with it.
Integer.Description: This GigE Vision specific feature corresponds to DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize and should be kept in sync with it. It specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in GEV timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in GEV timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCZoneCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the number of zones per block transmitted on the selected stream channel.
Integer.Description: Reports the number of zones per block transmitted on the selected stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCZoneDirectionAll
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the transmission direction of each zone transmitted on the selected stream channel.
Integer.Description: Reports the transmission direction of each zone transmitted on the selected stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCZoneConfigurationLock
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the selected stream channel multi-zone configuration is locked.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the selected stream channel multi-zone configuration is locked. When locked, the GVSP transmitter is not allowed to change the number of zones and their direction during block acquisition and transmission.

Integer.Name: aPAUSEMACCtrlFramesTransmitted
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the number of transmitted PAUSE frames.
Integer.Description: Reports the number of transmitted PAUSE frames.

Integer.Name: aPAUSEMACCtrlFramesReceived
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the number of received PAUSE frames.
Integer.Description: Reports the number of received PAUSE frames.

Enumeration.Name: ClConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the configuration used by the camera. It helps especially when a camera is capable of operation in a non-standard configuration, and when the features PixelSize, SensorDigitizationTaps, and DeviceTapGeometry do not provide enough information for interpretation of the image data provided by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Base
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard base configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Medium
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard medium configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: Full
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard full configuration described by the Camera Link standard.

EnumEntry.Name: DualBase
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The camera streams the data from multiple taps (that do not fit in the standard base configuration) through two Camera Link base ports.
EnumEntry.Description: The camera streams the data from multiple taps (that do not fit in the standard base configuration) through two Camera Link base ports. It is responsibility of the application or frame grabber to reconstruct the full image. Only one of the ports (fixed) serves as the "master" for serial communication and triggering.

EnumEntry.Name: EightyBit
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Standard 80-bit configuration with 10 taps of 8 bits or 8 taps of 10 bits, as described by the Camera Link standard.
EnumEntry.Description: Standard 80-bit configuration with 10 taps of 8 bits or 8 taps of 10 bits, as described by the Camera Link standard.

Enumeration.Name: ClTimeSlotsCount
Enumeration.ToolTip: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.
Enumeration.Description: This Camera Link specific feature describes the time multiplexing of the camera link connection to transfer more than the configuration allows, in one single clock.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the current and active Link configuration used by the Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the current and active Link configuration used by the Device.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Link configuration of the Device is unknown.
EnumEntry.Description: The Link configuration of the Device is unknown. Either the configuration operation has failed or there is nothing connected.

EnumEntry.Name: Pending
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Device is in the process of configuring the Link.
EnumEntry.Description: The Device is in the process of configuring the Link. The Link cannot be used yet.

EnumEntry.Name: CXP1_X1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 1 Connection operating at CXP-1 speed (1.25 Gbps).
EnumEntry.Description: 1 Connection operating at CXP-1 speed (1.25 Gbps).

EnumEntry.Name: CXP2_X1

EnumEntry.Description: 1 Connection operating at CXP-2 speed (2.50 Gbps).

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device. In most cases this feature does not need to be written because automatic discovery will set configuration correctly to the value returned by CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred. Note that the currently active configuration of the Link can be read using CxpLinkConfigurationStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: Auto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets Automatic discovery for the Link Configuration.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets Automatic discovery for the Link Configuration.

Boolean.Name: CxpLinkSharingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable or disable the link sharing functionality of the device.
Boolean.Description: Enable or disable the link sharing functionality of the device.

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingSubDeviceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Index of the sub device used in the Link Sharing.
Integer.Description: Index of the sub device used in the Link Sharing.
Integer.DisplayName: Cxp Link Sharing Sub Device Selector

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkSharingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature provides the data sharing status for the selected sub device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature provides the data sharing status for the selected sub device.

EnumEntry.Name: Ready
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sub device selected is ready.
EnumEntry.Description: The sub device selected is ready.

EnumEntry.Name: NotReady
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sub device selected is not ready.
EnumEntry.Description: The sub device selected is not ready.

EnumEntry.Name: NotUsed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sub device selected is not used.
EnumEntry.Description: The sub device selected is not used.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkSharingSubDeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature provides the type of sub device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature provides the type of sub device.
Enumeration.DisplayName: Cxp Link Sharing Sub Device Type

EnumEntry.Name: Master
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sub device is the master.
EnumEntry.Description: The sub device is the master.

EnumEntry.Name: Slave
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sub device is a slave.
EnumEntry.Description: The sub device is a slave.

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingHorizontalStripeCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the number of horizontal stripes that the device implements.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the number of horizontal stripes that the device implements.
Integer.DisplayName: Cxp Link Sharing Horizontal Stripe Count

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingVerticalStripeCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the number of vertical stripes that the device implements.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the number of vertical stripes that the device implements.
Integer.DisplayName: Cxp Link Sharing Vertical Stripe Count

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingHorizontalOverlap
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the number of pixel overlap in the horizontal stripes that the device implements.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the number of pixel overlap in the horizontal stripes that the device implements.

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingVerticalOverlap
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the number of pixel overlap in the vertical stripes that the device implements.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the number of pixel overlap in the vertical stripes that the device implements.

Integer.Name: CxpLinkSharingDuplicateStripe
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the duplicate count in striped system.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the duplicate count in striped system. A non-zero value sets the number of duplicate images sent to sub-Devices.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.

Enumeration.Name: CxpConnectionTestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the test mode for an individual physical connection of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the test mode for an individual physical connection of the Device.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current connection error count for test packets received by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current connection error count for test packets received by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Enumeration.Name: CxpSendReceiveSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which one of the send or receive features to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which one of the send or receive features to control.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestPacketCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current count for the test packets on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current count for the test packets on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Enumeration.Name: CxpErrorCounterSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Cxp Error Counter to read or reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Cxp Error Counter to read or reset.

EnumEntry.Name: ConnectionLockLoss
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of times the lock was lost.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of times the lock was lost.

EnumEntry.Name: Encoding
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of protocol encoding errors detected.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of protocol encoding errors detected.

EnumEntry.Name: StreamDataPacketCrc
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in a data packet.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in a data packet. This counter is only available on the CoaXpress host.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlPacketCrc
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in a control packet.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in a control packet.

EnumEntry.Name: EventPacketCrc
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in an event packet.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of CRC errors detected in an event packet.

EnumEntry.Name: DuplicatedCharactersCorrected
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of corrected errors in the duplicated characters in CXP control words.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of corrected errors in the duplicated characters in CXP control words.

EnumEntry.Name: DuplicatedCharactersUncorrected
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of uncorrected errors in the duplicated characters in CXP control words.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of uncorrected errors in the duplicated characters in CXP control words.

Command.Name: CxpErrorCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Command.Description: Resets the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset.

Integer.Name: CxpErrorCounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the current value of the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reads the current value of the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Enumeration.Name: CxpErrorCounterStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current status of the selected Cxp Error Counter on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter is actively counting errors.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter is actively counting errors.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterOverflow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter exceeded its maximum error count.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter exceeded its maximum error count.

Command.Name: CxpPoCxpAuto
Command.ToolTip: Activate automatic control of the Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) for the Link.
Command.Description: Activate automatic control of the Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) for the Link.

Command.Name: CxpPoCxpTurnOff
Command.ToolTip: Disable Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) for the Link.
Command.Description: Disable Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) for the Link.

Command.Name: CxpPoCxpTripReset
Command.ToolTip: Reset the Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) Link after an over-current trip on the Device connection(s).
Command.Description: Reset the Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) Link after an over-current trip on the Device connection(s).

Enumeration.Name: CxpPoCxpStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) status of the Device.
